alertDescription.value: the number of replicas is less than desired

query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_statefulset_status_replicas' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend statefulset = tostring(Json.statefulset) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | extend StatusReplicas=Val | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_statefulset_replicas' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend statefulset = tostring(Json.statefulset) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, Replicas=Val, statefulset, namespace) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, statefulset, namespace | where StatusReplicas < Replicas | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, StatusReplicas, Replicas, statefulset, namespace
